SENT.plain: We report a case of possible Behçet's disease (BD) preceded by arthropathy for 5 years
A 29-year-old man experienced right knee swelling and pain since April 1999
Thorough examinations were performed, yet a diagnosis was not established
In December 2004 he experienced recurrent aphtha, following folliculitis-like skin lesions
A human leukocyte antigen examination revealed a positive B51 allele and his illness was diagnosed as possible Behçet disease
Colchicine was administered and his symptoms were ameliorated
